Package net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Encapsulates the position and rotation of the client camera.
    Mesh
    Stores data about the object's shape (i.e.
    Renderer
    This manages which objects are to be rendered and also manages the uniforms within the shader program
    ShaderProgram
    This class manages the shader files and all the uniforms.
    Texture
    Stores a texture to be applied to a mesh.
    Transformations
    Utility class.
    WavefrontMeshLoader
    No longer needed as I do no longer plan on using Blender to generate objects
